description: A large queen size bed in master bedroom and one single bed (brand new delivered this week) in smaller room, plus futon for possible 4th guest. A large comfortable living room, adjacent dining area and newly renovated kitchen with all new appliances and newly remodelled bathroom. Jackson Heights is one of Queens' historic districts, known for its "garden-apartment" architecture and slate-roofed rowhouses.  One of the most socially and culturally diverse neighborhoods in the world.
name: Jackson Heights 2 bedrooms
review: This place is incredible.  I can't imagine you would want anything more out of an Airbnb experience:  great communication; clean, modern place; TV and wifi; we were greeted with wine, sausage, and cheese; and it's close to the LaGuardia airport.  I cannot say enough positive things about this place and host.
